channel.title: A few questions about Delphi....?
channel.description:
It be nice if a few people explain these questions to me....
Is Delphi just a IDE for Object Pascal? // Stupid Questions, Srry
Is Object Pascal dead or hardly used or not usefull to learn?
If delphi is Object Pascal, then isn't scar made from Object Pascal and not Delphi?
I am learning Scar, Should I learn Delphi too? // I probably should because they are both similar.
Thanks in Advance.... :D

item.title: A few questions about Delphi....?
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

For Scar, just learn pascal or follow the tutorials on this site.
Delphi is based on Pascal.
Object Pascal is Delphi.

No question is stupid, as you are always learning something from it.

No problem,
Leader

Read full topic
